parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front lower ball joint can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The ball joint separates from the A-frame
the vehicle scrapes on the pavement

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front shock absorbers can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The front shocks leak suspension fluid
the vehicle has frequent failures of the front shock absorbers
and the shocks are prone to leaking suspension fluid onto themselves and surrounding components.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed Recall Remedies for Ball Joint Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in providing recall remedies for ball joint failure can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Dealers do not have the proper tools to fix the vehicle
the manufacturer does not send advance parts for remedy
and parts can only be ordered once the vehicle experiences the failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hood shocks can cause the hood to suddenly drop down, resulting in injuries to the head, wrists, and fingers, and potentially causing damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The hood falls or crashes down without warning
the hood shocks do not support the hood weight
the hood suddenly releases and slams shut
the hood does not stay open.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Clock Spring Failure in Steering Column
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clock spring in the steering column can cause the airbag system to malfunction, leading to the disablement of the airbags and illumination of the airbag warning light. This can increase the risk of injury or death in the event of a crash.
symptoms: The airbag indicator light illuminates and does not dim
the check airbag indicator light illuminates
the cruise control functions on the steering wheel fail.
